definition[0]: a short attempt at doing a particular job or activity, especially one that is very different from what you usually do
example[0]: It will be my first foray into local government.
example[1]: Wright is about to make his first foray into the music business.
definition[1]: a short sudden attack by a group of soldiers, especially in order to get food or supplies
example[2]: their nightly forays into enemy territory
definition[2]: a short journey somewhere in order to get something or do something
example[3]: We make regular forays to France to buy wine.
